displayText: At the end of 2021, COVID-19 vaccines were being supplied smoothly and borders were being loosened one by one, showing signs of recovery.

However, things started to change ever since a shocking article from New York Times was published in early 2022. The article stated that some Covid-19 patients were showing strange symptoms throughout the states.
This was not only happening in U.S., but in other countries as well. Researchers from laboratories across the world announced that SARS-CoV-2 has mutated, causing new and mysterious symptoms.

Towards November 2022, the number of mutated Covid patients drastically increased. People infected with this new type of virus -people called it Covid-Z- suffered from three consecutive fevers that came randomly.

About half of Covid-Z patients, after recovering from the third fever, acted like zombies. They were still alive unlike typical zombies. In other words, patients still had heart beating, with no vital signs.
The known symptoms for Covid-Z were decaying bodies and slow movement. Covid-Z patients recognised living humans as prey, lacking rationality, intellect and social information processing.

The world became chaotic and all borders started to close. Fortunately, people with high levels of immunity towards Covid-Z voluntarily became members of the Virus Centre and soon, vaccines for Covid-Z were developed.

Unfortunately, due to zombies roaming the city streets, there were difficulties in supplying the vaccine and some people had to go directly to the laboratory in the Virus Centre to collect the vaccine.
You are one of the brave people who have decided to face immense danger by going to the Laboratory for your family and neighbours.
